attributes.action: invstigate the legality of charges for settlement of loans BEFORE the end of the term
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The interest on loans (and thus the monthly payments) are calculated based on the length of the term.
If you settle the debt early, the interest is logically therefore reduced and thus the amount for early settlement should ALWAYS be less than the monthly payment multiplied by the number of monthly payments remaining.
